sentences.en: Air enters the pore space and air - water interfaces are present in the pore space.
sentences.cn: 空气进入孔隙空间且在孔隙空间存在空气 - 水接触面.

sentences.en: Anthracite char has poor pore structure and small specific surface area.
sentences.cn: 无烟煤焦分支孔贫乏,比表面积很小.

sentences.en: Aspiration inking is available from the perspective of pore size account.
sentences.cn: 吸不朱度可以从孔隙不小小角度举行思考.

sentences.en: Capital comes dripping from head to foot, from every pore with blood and dirt.
sentences.cn: 资本来到世间,从头到脚, 每个毛孔都滴着血和肮脏的东西.

sentences.en: He was sweating through every pore.
I see him chafe and fret at every pore.
She oozes sexuality from every pore.
sentences.cn: 她浑身上下每个毛孔都散发着性感。

sentences.en: The black head on how cleared nose? Pore won't of magnify?
sentences.cn: 怎样清除鼻子上的黑头? 毛孔又不会张大的?

sentences.en: The calcium carbonate content of phosphate rock determines the pore structure.
sentences.cn: 磷矿中碳酸钙的含量决定了磷矿的毛细孔结构.

sentences.en: The cross - sectional areas of the pore openings vary along their length.
sentences.cn: 孔隙通道的 横截面 面积沿其长度方向变化.

sentences.en: The female pore, are most commonly a single pair.
The pore velocity is the velocity with which a tracer moves through a porous medium.
sentences.cn: 孔隙速度是示踪元素穿过孔隙介质的速度.

sentences.en: The size of your pores is determined by the amount of oil they produce.
sentences.cn: 毛孔的大小取决于毛孔分泌油脂的多少。

sentences.en: They pore over well - thumbed pages as if touring their favorite market place.
sentences.cn: 他们熟读经常翻阅的那几页好像漫游他们最喜爱的市场一样.

sentences.en: Under extreme conditions of rapid coke forming materials, pore mouth blockag e can occur.
sentences.cn: 在快速形成焦炭物料的极端情况下, 孔口会发生堵塞.

sentences.en: Waves of misery penetrated every pore.
We spent hours poring over travel brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们花了几个小时仔细研究旅游宣传册。

trans.tran_en: one of the small holes in your skin that liquid, especially sweat, can pass through, or a similar hole in the surface of a plant
